name: Starlight Stones - MSU 3D Platform Project
description:
Modifications:

--Player and enemy scale

--Jump height and gravity (Much narrower window for attack success)

--3D Text included in first level (4th wall broken by developer)

--Music and SFX Volume

--Enemy Awareness, Vision Radius, Speed, and Certainty

--3rd Person Camera Rotation and Position, certain moments push the player into certain angles

--UI pages and transparency
